Fuck this game is shit. The community is alright but without swf you are fucked. The fucking brainlits in this game that just sit there thinking that the killer can kill three people in one hit without a chainsaw piss me off. Even one killer face camped me three games in a row because i called him a face camper. But its addictive and most of the players in my region are really shit, but the community isn't terrible. Suck my willy.

EDIT: This game is a disappointment. It has been about a year since my first review, and i think a whole of a lot worse about the game. The change in the animations and the crappy hitboxes, which seem to have gotten worse, ruin the experience and the motivation for me to ever play this game again. You have more chance of beating pontiff no xp than getting good hitboxes and successfully moonwalking & 360ing. This game has only become more toxic, and i think im going back to siege for the first time in half a year, because shit, this game was good, now its way below average. No0b3, you dont have to post again, trust me. S-h-i-t-e game. Mind you it is probably good for new players, but i feel like its harder for OG's or atleast experienced players to have that relatively fun experience. Cheers.

Баланс? Какой баланс? Раньше играть за выжившего было интересно. Возможность сбежать была гораздо вероятнее. Но сейчас ты сможешь сбежать, если играешь с друзьями вместе против маньяка ( и то не факт), либо, если маньяк сам позволит тебе уйти. Господа разработчики, вы хоть сами пробовали играть в одиночку за выжившего? Сколько раз сбегали? На доктора попадали, и как вам? Круто, когда бьет током через полкарты? Раньше прыжок через окно или палетку имел смысл, удар маньяка не проходил через них. Теперь маньяк тебя достает даже если ты отбежал на два шага от палетки. Радиус удара теперь больше чем сам удар оружия. Ты можешь уже отбежать, но огребешь по хребту все равно. Раньше по многу часов залипал в игре, теперь не больше 2-3 матчей. Чисто зайти посмотреть, изменилось ли что нибудь в лучшую сторону или нет? В общем, никому не советую. Долго хотел написать негативный отзыв. Но все надеялся, что баланс вернут в игру. Но походу надежды умерли. Сношу нафиг эту игра. А жаль, потенциал у нее был огромный.

Jogo legal pra jogar com os amigos. Muitos assassinos legais e muitas builds diferentes pra fazer. Gosto de jogar fazendo objetivos (missões, rituais diários, tentar upar até tal nível, fazer todas as conquistas possíveis, juntar dinheiro pra comprar uma skin ou um personagem novo), desse jeito fica mais divertido jogar, já que quando vc só joga por jogar fica bem repetitivo.

Bon déjà pour commencer direct. 
La communauté est déjà LE gros point faible du jeu plus toxic tu meurs!
Franchement peu être vous aurez du fun a vos premières heures de jeux comme j'en ai eu mais ensuite vous allez vite perdre votre fun.

Jeu compliqué en tueur les générateurs ce font trop vite même en étant main survivant je trouve le nerf de ruine totalement CON y'a pas d'autres mots ça n'a amener que + de toxicité de la part des deux camps

J'ai beau parfois détester ce jeu DBD est comme une sorte de drogue étrange donc franchement les nouveaux ne le prenez pas. En plus le matchmaking est inexistant en rang 20 vous pouvez jouer contre des tueur rang 1 (no fake) et vous faire rouler dessus tout simplement :)
Après je passe les tueurs qui camp/tunnel/slug/trashtalk=90% du jeu si pas plus.

alors petit edit :
sachez qu'apparemment nous français habitons en russie. vous serez 90% du temps matcher avec des russes je vous passe les détails de ce pays merveilleux dans le monde du gaming... vous voyez le dessin HAVE FUN !

Si vous voulez un jeu ou vous n'allez pas vous amuser mise a part a vos 5 premières heures de noob allez y vous le regretterez pas.

Au final ça me fait rire de lire les évaluation les seuls positives sont les nouveau joueurs qui n'ont pas encore vu l'envers du décor avec leur 30 heures de jeu

Eu gostei muito de ter jogado esse jogo com os amigos, mas com certeza não teria metade das minhas horas jogadas se fosse sozinho. O jogo não é NADA amistoso com iniciantes, você vai entrar em partidas contra pessoas com 1000 horas de jogo (não é exagero em certos casos) e vai ser massacrado pela experiência com um matchmaking ruim, tanto de assassino quanto de sobrevivente. Tirando o desbalanceamento das filas e de alguns personagens, eu gostei bastante e me diverti, claro... após aprender na marra a jogar de forma descente.
O jogo tem vários pontos positivos assim como negativos, mas sem dúvidas ele possui uma das piores coisas que um jogo online poderia ter, desenvolvedores que *comumente* ignoram a comunidade, bufs e nerfs muitas vezes infundados e personagens nitidamente desbalanceados, na maioria das vezes tornam o jogo mais frustrante a cada atualização, tomando diversas atitudes questionáveis indo além do que um jogo competitivo comum deveria fazer, simplesmente porque eles são os únicos com um jogo grande que satisfaz sua fã base, não existe risco de um outro jogo do mesmo gênero atrair os jogadores a abandonar esse. O jogo é bom no geral, mas os desenvolvedores ignoram a comunidade geral e o torna mais frustrante a casa mês, além de massacrar os iniciantes, recomendo se for jogar com amigos ou se gosta MUITO de um jogo nessa temática.

One of my go to games when friends and I don't know what else to play. Tons of content means tons of fun to be had. One of the best games I can think of for group play, and playing killer when you are solo is just as fun. My only con would be the steep entry price if you want to buy every single DLC. The base game is affordable though, and it is more than enough to get the fun started. Worry about getting the DLC later.

Although i dont have a tremendous amount of hours put into this game but i actually enjoy being a survivor hitting every perfect skill check, saving friends from hooks, and sometimes hitting perfect games where every survivor executes his role perfectly the role being a mechanic or a distraction it is very satisfying and then there is the killer which is a completely different animal killer is amazing to play the feeling that you dont have to fear a killer is thrilling you feel a rush while chasing survivors and then downing them with a perfectly aimed hatchet or a perfectly placed trap and utilizing your ability in general gives you a feeling of satisfaction.
This game is amazing it doesnt take much to learn and doesnt take much to master either i strongly recommend it if wanna getaway from common genres such as shooters and mmo rpgs
